name: Girls Party Makeup
description:
-------- Welcome to Girls Party Makeup --------
If you are a party girl then “Girls Party Makeup” is just for you. You don’t have to purchase any party makeup app. “Girls Party Makeup” is completely free with all makeover items. You will find endless makeup options to create your desired party makeup.
It’s time to create most beautiful party makeup look. Professional makeup tools kit is ready; you just need to apply makeup items and show makeup art.

Be a party makeup expert with “Girls Party Makeup World”.

Features:

• Countless makeup items
• Amazing hair styles, tattoos, lip glosses, mascara, eye shades, blushes and much more things
• Colorful HD makeup environment

*************************************** About Prophetic Games ***************************************
